title: Feature Management CRUD Skills
description: Create Claude Code skills for creating, updating, and archiving items in feature-management directories. Skills include: create-bug, create-feature, create-action, update-status, and archive-item. Skills should encode best practices for interacting with feature-management repositories and work on any feature-management directory passed as a parameter.
user_impact: Enables users to manage bugs, features, and human actions through natural language commands without manually creating files and maintaining JSON metadata
